name: Boxy's Quest (Tell me anything I should add)
name_original: Boxy's Quest (Tell me anything I should add)
description:
Boxy's Quest (Tell me anything I should add) is an adventure game developed by Personon. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Boxy's Quest (Tell me anything I should add) on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
